snippet: Berkshire Hathaway, led by Warren E. Buffett, posted a 29 percent jump in third-quarter profit, but operating results fell short of analyst forecasts because of weakness in its insurance operations.
abstract: Berkshire Hathaway posts 29 percent jump in third-quarter profit, but operating results fall short of analyst forecasts because of weakness in its insurance operations.
lead_paragraph: Berkshire Hathaway, led by Warren E. Buffett, posted a 29 percent jump in third-quarter profit, but operating results fell short of analyst forecasts because of weakness in its insurance operations.

headline.main: Berkshire Reports 29% Jump in Quarterly Profit
